div.ab: When they tighten the rope to get a few answers, he must say three times, afaksios, arios, trios, akvaksios, agla, alfa, adah, and must say three times, look to my right and see in the name of B'yeit, Metatron, Taftafayah.
It is the same(?) as the name (???), in roshei teivot (first letters) and gematria, I will be [what I will be].

To see a thief or another thing: Take a medium-sized wax candle that has a mark on the bottom(???) and write underneath on that place with a pin that you borrowed from a luceregone (light-voyant?) woman, and when you want to see the matter, alight the light, and give a boy or a fine maiden that is not older than seven years, and give them the light
